description: MainActivity.kt defines the main screen of an Android note management app. It handles listing notes, searching, creating, editing, deleting, and logging out. It interacts with REST API endpoints via ApiClient, manages UI components, and handles user interactions.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity for displaying, searching, creating, editing, and deleting notes. Manages user session tokens and navigates to note detail or login screens.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes UI components, checks user token, sets up RecyclerView and button listeners, fetches initial notes.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from API, optionally filtered by a search query, and updates the UI.

methods.name: openEditNote
methods.description: Navigates to NoteDetailActivity for editing an existing note.

methods.name: openCreateNote
methods.description: Navigates to NoteDetailActivity for creating a new note.

methods.name: confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows a confirmation dialog before deleting a note.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note via API call and updates the UI.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Refreshes the notes list when returning to the activity.
